website_summaries.verdict: A relatively inexpensive electric pencil sharpener that is still reliable and durable.
pros: Tends to be quieter than other pencil sharpeners
Stops sharpening when your pencil is sharp
Blue light comes on when the pencil is sharp
Great if you have to sharpen a lot of #2 pencils
cons: it is not fitted to sharpen flat lumber or construction pencils

customer_reviews.title: Caution when buying Amazon Warehouse Goods
customer_reviews.text: This was probably a good product, but I purchased a used one from amazon warehouse. Apparently, these items are stocked upon return, but not tested. This one made a lot of noise and did not spin the blade. So, I decided to open it and found that the motor gear had slipped and was not contacting the gear that turns the blade. I reinserted the slipped gear and locked it in place. So now it works and I’ll keep it..... but buyer beware- Amazon does not test the returns that they sell - it appears.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Fichera Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Timeless classic that will serve you well.
customer_reviews.text: Super fast, sturdy, my go to! I had one for 16+ years, when we moved from our house to an apartment I know I boxed this up, but as we were unpacking I simply cannot find it. Grateful when I found it on Amazon for this price, I immediately purchased my new one. If I find the old one, gravey! This is a timeless electric pencil sharpener, and will serve you for years if its anything like the old one that I know is somewhere in my house.
customer_reviews.author: CemeTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control.
customer_reviews.text: I probably received a lemon. It does happen from time to time. The sharpener stared but immediately stopped as soon as the first pencil was inserted. Seems as if the overload sensor is too sensitive. I waited 5-10 minutes & the sharpener would again grunt and stop as another pencil was inserted. Regardless of how lightly I pushed the pencil, the sharpener would stop obviously on overload as I had to wait to try again.
customer_reviews.author: jrskalin

customer_reviews.title: Works great with most pencils
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this sharpener. On some pencils it takes a lot to sharpen all sides and I am not sure why, but for 90% of the pencils I have sharpened it works fast and super sharp. My wife accidentally stabbed herself shortly after a pencil was sharpened though, so be careful...
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Like My Old One
customer_reviews.text: I had one like this at work. It was probably an older model but it worked extremely well. I've been retired for awhile now and I decided to purchase a new sharpener since my battery operated one expired. I received it, plugged it in, and started using it immediately. Works just like my old office unit with the same reassuring sound of it's motor. Sharpened over a dozen pencils in a few minutes. I'm a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: tttno1948

customer_reviews.title: Sharpens pencils to 'weapon grade'
customer_reviews.text: Others have commented and it is really true.. the device works fine but it sharpens the pencil to an extremely sharp point almost more like a weapon than a writing instrument. I like that I can plug it in even though the connection is USB. I only need to use it rarely and I fear that a battery powered device would have dead batteries when I finally needed it.
customer_reviews.author: RJMAN

customer_reviews.title: The depth of the point is a little longer than average and the sharpness is like a dagger
customer_reviews.text: For an artist with a ton of pencils, this is exactly what I needed. My only wish is that you could adjust the point of the pencil. There is only 1 setting for point length and sharpness. The depth of the point is a little longer than average and the sharpness is like a dagger! Keep away from children. Seriously.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith M

customer_reviews.title: X-ACTLY what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my home office and it's actually been used more by my kids than me. They like to keep their pencils nice and sharp for their homework! The sharpener has a nice weighted base so it does not need to be held down when sharpening a pencil. The blades create an evenly sharpened pencil and emptying the shavings is very easy since the basin is in the front. Good product for home, office, or school!
customer_reviews.author: Honest Frizz

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after a month
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed in this product. Initially, worked well but motor sound concerned me. I am a teacher and sharpen a lot of pencils. Initially, great after a month, the motor burned out. The box says product has a two year warranty for the motor. I contacted AMAZON and they said they would make a one time exception. I explained that the motor had a two year warranty and the representative said he did not show it. Amazon did give me credit, but this product disappoints. I ordered another from same maker - "The School Pro".... will have to wait and see.
customer_reviews.author: penandpearls

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: Got this after realizing that I'd have to sharpen 92 pencils to send to school. It managed the beginning load well except that I had to take several breaks to allow it to cool down since it would overheat and shut down after every 20 or so pencils. The waste bit was somewhat difficult to remove and put back, especially for the kids. Ultimately, the sharpener broke a few weeks later even with almost no use since the start of school. Went with a different brand after that that's still working well.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Doughty

customer_reviews.title: regular pencils only
customer_reviews.text: So far its great for regular pencils. I tried some of my colored pencils in them, no, big no! But for regular pencils it gives you a really nice sharp point in no time. I even tried some of those pencils with a plastic covers that a lot of pencil sharpeners have trouble with and it works fine. So I'd recommended for regular pencils only. I've had it for several months before I made this review also.
customer_reviews.author: Deedle

customer_reviews.title: I would have given a five...
customer_reviews.text: The product came looking used and repacked. There is pencil marks on the pencil sharpener. I had to wipe the marks off. So very disappointed. When I purchase new, I expect to receive a new product. It sharpens on one side so I am going to have to learn to rotate the pencil. Other than these observations. I am fine with the product. It’s only been 3 hours and I have only sharpened one pencil.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Well I bought this in September of 2018 and just used it last night, Feb. 9, 2019 and after sharpening no more than 6 pencils it no longer worked. It was difficult to use as the pencils would not sharpen evenly and eventually not at all. Amazon recommends this product... need to take another look Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: I expected more 🤷‍♂️
customer_reviews.text: Maybe my expectations are too high, but I thought this would sharpen faster and not jamb. My son and I had fun sharpening about 20 pencils and while it did well most of them, sometimes it would jamb and I’d have to twist the pencil and pull it out. It takes a little while to sharpen the pencils, too. I thought it’d crank them out.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Howell

customer_reviews.title: Half sharpened pencils
customer_reviews.text: Since day one, this has half-sharpened pencils. I finally decided to try to start twisting pencils around so that it will shave both sides, but that is a pain and comes at increased risk of breakage. This is not a great pencil sharpener. I came back to write this review two years later while I'm shopping for a better pencil sharpener.
customer_reviews.author: L. Cooke

customer_reviews.title: 4.5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm torn between 4 and 5 stars here. This product sharpens really well and fast but as others have said the pencils come out somewhat sharpened off center. It's an easy fix though. I put the pencil in for a second one way then remove it and flip the bottom side up and sharpen it again. That way it's more centered. It doesn't bother me enough to return the product and it sure beats using a manual sharpener!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittania

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this because we are going through a ton of pencils with my kids home from school and online learning. It works great right out of the box for regular pencils and colored pencils. The ones that are wrapped in plastic designs can be a little tricky though. Glad it shipped quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay S.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good sharpener
customer_reviews.text: This sharpener left a lot to be desired from the start. Pencils that were sharpened using this sharpener came out with a point except that half of the point was still the wooden shaft of the pencil which rendered the writable portion of the pencil unusable. We tried turning the pencil as we sharpened it but that chewed up the pencil faster and often broke the lead. After trying to get the sharpener to work for a week, I'm returning it and trying my luck with another sharpener. With all of the choices, I would personally not buy nor recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Navaid

customer_reviews.title: X-ACTO Electric Sharpener
customer_reviews.text: I really like this pencil sharpener! Works very well. You plug it into a wall (doesn't use batteries). I have found that all I need to do is stick the pencil in it for 1-2 seconds max to come out almost perfect ... any longer than that, and the pencil will sharpen more on one side than the other, making for the lead to snap off easier. Once I got the hang of it I loved it even more.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Wingfield

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working with minimal use:update; manufacturer made good
customer_reviews.text: Was a great pencil sharpener until it stopped working. The motor runs but no longer spins the blade. I probably sharpen one or two pencils per month for home use only. Stopped working after less than 1.5 years owning the product so that’s about 18 sharpened pencils, or almost one dollar per pencil sharpening (maybe we could stretch it to 50 cents per sharpen) Update: I contacted the manufacturer and as it was still in warranty, they sent me a replacement. Working well so far again.
customer_reviews.author: S. J. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: As others have reported, it simply stopped working. The motor hums but the blades don't spin. This happened inside a month, probably 4-5 pencils sharpened. Luckily I'm able to send it back for a replacement with minimal fuss, but no fuss at all would have been preferable.
customer_reviews.author: jaileer

customer_reviews.title: Small hole sharpener.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. The hole where to insert the pencil is very small. You can barely get a pencil into the sharpener. I am debating whether to return it. I like it otherwise but am concerned that it will break since the hole is so tight.
customer_reviews.author: Atlatla

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Was so sick of breaking tips of pencils while sharpening them in little electric sharpening\rs using little tiny blade sharpeners on a spindle. this product has the spinning multi blade barrel sharpener like the old manual ones that hung on walls. Finally I elongated the life of my colored pencils with their soft lead. Use this all the time .
customer_reviews.author: Foxy Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: I received this and started to sharpen my pencils when it jammed in first attempt! On the second try it worked for 2 seconds then jammed up! Save your time and money! Mine is packed up and ready to return!!
customer_reviews.author: Helen Stamatelatos

customer_reviews.title: Pencil nirvana
customer_reviews.text: OMG, this little device is my new favorite thing. I love writing with old school #2 pencils. I’d had it with my old cheapo sharpener and tossed it. This little beauty sharpens to a lethal point, does not eat your pencil, and shuts itself off when you’ve reached maximum sharpness. Greatest pencil sharpener EVER!
customer_reviews.author: wendi L froedge

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY put in one colored pencil and it stopped ...
customer_reviews.text: STAY AWAY put in one colored pencil and it stopped working and then it would not work,and sent it back
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in February so that my son could have sharp pencils for his homework. It worked great for three months- the rest of the school year. BUT we found out last night that it no longer works- absolutely nothing happens when you put a pencil in.
customer_reviews.author: tinhart

customer_reviews.title: Not knock-proof
customer_reviews.text: The pencil sharpener is great, but it's NOT drop-proof. My toddler knocked it off the window ledge two hours after we opened the box, and now it no longer works. Yes, that's obviously not the fault of the makers; however, I'm removing a star because I do believe it should be able to withstand at least some minor bumps and bruises.
customer_reviews.author: Boy3 Mom

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kids several months ago. It’s very easy to use, but takes longer than previous electric sharpeners we’ve had. It also will occasionally sharpen unevenly and we have to do it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mama2five

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than a year and then it was gone....
customer_reviews.text: Bought it in May 2020 , it broke after light use on October. 2020. My kids are in high school and use more mechanical pencils. We got this for color pencils for use in Algebra and Science.
customer_reviews.author: vsg714

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: So far as the easy to use go so good just got it 3 days ago. Only used it to sharpen 10 pencils. It sharpens well. As far as emptying it out it’s horrible the pencil shavings we’re out of the can when I opened it. It’s a loud sharpener
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace my sharpener and read the erroneous report/review of sharpeners provided on Amazon. It said this product stops sharpening when the pencil is sharp - Not True; said a blue light comes on when the pencil is sharp - Not True; and said it is quieter than other sharpeners - Not True - is the nosiest sharpener I have ever had. It does not produce an evenly sharpened pencil and I can find no redeeming qualities to recommend. I have had mine about a week and am ready to replace. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Baker

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Guess I got the one that was put together right before the end of the day on a Friday. It’s going back.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Rich

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Why did I wait so long to get an electric pencil sharpener? I do artwork and have struggled with sharpening pencils. This works like a gem.
customer_reviews.author: Rd2

customer_reviews.title: Will I Ever Find A Decent Sharpener for Colored Pencils????
customer_reviews.text: After sharpening a few colored pencils it overheats and shuts off. That’s not a bad thing but I wish I could get more pencils sharpened before it happened.
customer_reviews.author: JYW1324

customer_reviews.title: It can Stain
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit loud but it's also an electric pencil sharpener. It does the job. The downside is that some of the lead shavings come out, so it will stain the surface it's on. Just keep in mind to add "clean under sharpener" as a typical to-do task. Otherwise it catches the shavings and everything nicely. Again, it just tends to stain around the surface it's on.
customer_reviews.author: Devon Ritter

customer_reviews.title: After reading prior reviews I choose this sharpener & thus far I'm extremely pleased. The price was responsible & shipped out qu
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of adult coloring books, I prefer color pencils over jell markers. I needed a sharpener that can stand up to consistent use. After reading prior reviews I choose this sharpener & thus far I'm extremely pleased. The price was responsible & shipped out quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jill E.

customer_reviews.title: Kindergarten Teacher Gift
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the classroom pencil sharpener for Christmas. The teacher noted that this one has lasted longer than the others so we bought the same one. I hope this one outlasts the last one. The classroom was super excited as well!
customer_reviews.author: C Miiller

customer_reviews.title: Did not function at all. I mean, the ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not function at all. I mean, the motor did not even come on. Unfortunately my return window is closed, so I'm out fifteen bucks. Based on my experience, I would say do not take a chance on this product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Madden

customer_reviews.title: Shuts off if you sharpen too many in a row
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely better than sharpening pencils by hand but it shuts off randomly if you sharpen too many pencils in a row. Which can be frustrating at times because I am a teacher and I sharpen pencils in bulk. But good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Catalfamo

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: My parents still have an X-acto pencil sharpener that is about 20 years old and still works great. So I figured I'd give this one a shot. It works just as well and just as sturdy. Quality hasn't diminished! Very well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: cketchu

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't even turn on.
customer_reviews.text: Would not work. tried several outlets. The inside casing was cracked, like it was screwed in too far, and there was something loose inside rattling around. I was really wanting to try this and excited about the brand, but it was a waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Daly

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after hardly any usage
customer_reviews.text: Barely used in the year we have had it and it has quit working for us. Went to get pencils ready for students and it would not work. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Wertz

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the product. Sharpener has worked great especially with small children in the house and colored pencils ALWAYS needing to be sharpened. Easy to operate, Easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Marques

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd sharpener I purchased for my sister in a nursing home who likes to color with colored pencils on adult coloring books. She is the only one who uses it. It has quit working, same as my previous one purchased for her. I would not recommend this, now I have to purchase another one and spend 3 times the money for the same product, maybe 3rd times a charm, but it won't be this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jerilyn

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Sharpens fast and we'll. Needed a cheap sharpener because my students break things, but surprisingly nthis works very well.
customer_reviews.author: The Texan

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works good, on time, as advertised. The pitch on the sharpened pencil end is a little steep, shortens the available lead exposed.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M. Gruen

customer_reviews.title: Still works.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Been using it every day (about 30 pencils/day because I’m pretty sure the kids eat the pencils immediately after they use them). I’ve had it for over a month and it still works.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Genzer

customer_reviews.title: Pencil Sharpener
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease of use and how well it sharpens. Well built, it will last a lifetime. Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: gramsynan

customer_reviews.title: The best pencil sharpener I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: This is truly the best! It is a little loud, but heck I do not think I have ever owned an electric pencil sharpener that wasn't loud. It gets the pencil razor sharp and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal D Panceroff

customer_reviews.title: I have the receipt.
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t work. I returned it to the UPS store, along with some socks, an iPad extender, and another faulty pencil sharpener. Joe Simpson
customer_reviews.author: Joe Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Sharpens great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, it is a little loud but heck it sharpens great and in seconds! It stays in place while in use too.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Donna

customer_reviews.title: Works extremely well
customer_reviews.text: This sharpener works extremely well. We had been using a manual sharpener and this automatic one really is a step up!
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Hall

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't over sharpen pencils
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few other brands but have come back to this one because I like it best. They last about 10 years with home use. They don't over sharpen, saving pencil length. Easy to dump shavings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only good for sharpening a few pencils at a time
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to sharpen pencils for my kids for beginning of school. Overheated quickly and quit working after one use. Didn’t even get halfway thru all the pencils I needed. Box says it’s rated for moderate large office, but it won’t sharpen more than a few pencils at a time. Would take me forever to sharpen all the pencils my kids need for school at that rate.
customer_reviews.author: Amberlk2

customer_reviews.title: Maybe defective, returning
customer_reviews.text: Will return, sharpens 1/2 the pencil. Leaves wood on one side.....WHAT THE........defective ? My Dad's technique of using a sharp knife works better.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. William D. Kern Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Defective
customer_reviews.text: The unit arrived defective. It had a "QC9" product inspected sticker on the bottom. When I plugged it in and inserted a pencil, the motor hummed quietly but did not turn the cutting blades. I requested a replacement via Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: QuoVadimus

customer_reviews.title: Broke quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Mine broke after maybe 4 or 5 uses? We tried everything to make it work again. Unfortunately, our return window just closed. Such a shame because I loved my last x-acto sharpener, it lasted me so many years. Maybe I got a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Ryder

customer_reviews.title: Too loud!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the loudest sharpener I have ever imagined one could be. It would wake a sleeping baby!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy
customer_reviews.text: Absolute JUNK! Sharpened about 15 pencils and it quit. It’s a sealed unit and un-repairable. Threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Medley

customer_reviews.title: cup is not tight enough
customer_reviews.text: Have to hold the cup in to make it work. Then i sent it back Slow on refund though.
customer_reviews.author: LPB

customer_reviews.title: Can't Go Wrong With This Item
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one of this exact same sharpener our family has purchased over the years and we've never been disappointed. It may not have the whiz bang features of some of the others but it does one thing well, it sharpens pencils perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Eggo

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work
customer_reviews.text: The sharpener will not work unless you physically HOLD the shaving drawer in with your free hand. Take your finger off the drawer, it quits working. Total JUNK. Just be sure if you buy one, you check it out before a month goes buy. After that, Amazon will not stand behind it, then you eat it whether it works or not.
customer_reviews.author: Edward W. Hays

customer_reviews.title: Lemon
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working the first day we used it. What a pain to have to send it back!
customer_reviews.author: S. K.

customer_reviews.title: The company has great product support
customer_reviews.text: I received a sharpener that did not work and the company was quick to remedy that and send me a new better sharpener. The new sharpener is great.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Neimeth

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Sharpens pencils, what more should it do??? It is ok, sharpens pencils with a little intelligence----if you push the pencil in and hold it in until there is nothing but a nub, that is not a product issue, but a user malfunction....
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: stopped working after less than 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Worked well until it just stopped working. We've had it less than two years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Unpacked it, plugged it in, and inserted a pencil. Nothing. Reinserted several times. Nothing. Finally, I tilted the entire machine backwards at a 45 degree angle, and it worked intermittently. So, if you want a sharpener that works intermittently if you tilt it, this one's for you! LOL
customer_reviews.author: StratDawg

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 2 days and now either won't turn on when pencil is inserted or it turns on and won't stop even after the pencil is taken out. The few occasions where it does actually work it does a crap job of actually sharpening the pencil.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Im actually surprised by the weight of it seems super durable, I have 6 kids 4 of which are in school and its standing up to my expectations so far. Love xacto brand for sure, plus it comes with a 2 year warranty so happy about that!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Guidi

customer_reviews.title: Not a good item
customer_reviews.text: Rotating blades at too sharp an angle. Puts a triangular rather than elongated point on pencil. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Mick E.

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than expected. Larger than expected. Works better than expected. Wonderful item.
customer_reviews.author: Jana O'Dell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pencil sharpener
customer_reviews.text: This arrived today and looks & functions well. It appears to be a real sturdy sharpener.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: So noisy. Would send it back but needed to use it. Do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Makes it so much easier!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because we had a great many pencils to sharpen before we put them into Operation Christmas Child shoeboxes. It did a great job.
customer_reviews.author: diligent student

customer_reviews.title: Corona Sharpener
customer_reviews.text: BEST purchase during this corona time. I was super over sharpening by hand!get one....now
customer_reviews.author: Lila

customer_reviews.title: Sharpens as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Not quite sure how to review this.... considering it did the job! My son has to have 24 pencils for class in the fall and they have to be sharpened. I bought this based on the good reviews even though it was a bit pricey. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Mama P

customer_reviews.title: INCAPABLE of sharpening JUMBO pencils
customer_reviews.text: I saw there were thousands of very positive reviews. Further, I searched the "Q&A" section of the listing for "jumbo pencils." Several people said that this pencil sharpener was capable of sharpening jumbo pencils. This is NOT true. The My First(R) Ticonderoga(R) jumbo pencil does not even make it through the hole of the sharpener (see attached pictures). What is worse, you don't need to go that thick with the pencils: even the DIXON TRI-CONDEROGA(TM) pencils cannot be sharpened (see attached pictures). Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Chana V.

customer_reviews.title: ok sharpener
customer_reviews.text: It sharpens alright, its light weight, so may need to hold it steady, this sharpener is loud. I wouldn't recommend it for a school, etc. I just use it at home, alone, so it will do.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnyside Up

customer_reviews.title: Already broken.
customer_reviews.text: Not recommended in a classroom where I have to sharpen a lot of them
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: POC
customer_reviews.text: It chewed up my pencils. I have returned very few products, so I never paid attention to the 30 day return limit. Because of the pandemic, I didn't have alittle box to return it. By the time I did...oh well....A piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Christena Lundy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: everything exacto makes is AMAZING. shipping was on time and prompt
customer_reviews.author: Pooh2Hunny

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy by has some design flaw.
customer_reviews.text: I am bought this sharper after trying some other flimsy sharpener. This is a sturdy unit but it has some defect. The unit supposed to work when we feed the pencil but it is not. It works when I press the body of the sharpener. I cleaned the tray and made sure no pencil residue is creating this issue. But no luck. This unit has some manufacturing defect.
customer_reviews.author: Sathish Govindarajan

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Sharpener
customer_reviews.text: Fast and efficient. Large capacity for office and artist work! Shaves and sharpens cleanly without leaving half the wood on one side of your pencil I hate it when that happens!).
customer_reviews.author: static

customer_reviews.title: Finally a sharpner that doeant break.
customer_reviews.text: I have been threw multiple expensive pencil sharpeners this year. This is the 1st has not broken. You can tell it is heavy duty and it sharpens it perfectly
customer_reviews.author: sail4life

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: As with all sharpeners you have to “hold your tongue right “
customer_reviews.author: Jack L. Whitley

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Loud and Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: It was really good at first but now it's making a horribly loud sound and I can't make it stop. I understand now why I must have received this one as a "flash deal"... It still works... sometimes...but when it does it is always extremely LOUD.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Perguson

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Take Chunky Pencils
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this sharpener only takes regular size pencils. I bought this for my grandsons preschool pencils which are chunky. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: GoldenMomSWFL

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty powerful pencil sharpener. It isn’t super quiet but that’s fine for us. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Sara A. Hartwig

customer_reviews.title: Not for Classroom use
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 3 weeks-became jammed and was impossible to repair. Might be ok for an individual but not for a classroom
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Kids are rough! This works great for what they need.
customer_reviews.author: Thornlily2

customer_reviews.title: Broken after less than 100 pencils
customer_reviews.text: Less than 2 months of use and less than 100 pencils sharpened and the sharpener has died. I do not let students use it and I only sharpen a handful of pencils. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Micro-switch improperly calibrated. Didn't work as delivered.
customer_reviews.text: I had to to take this item apart and fix it before it would work. The peg in the receptacle wasn't long enough to activate the micro-switch, so I had to shim it with duct tape to get the machine to turn on when a pencil was inserted. Either that, or hold the receptacle in with one hand while sharpening the pencil with the other, making it a two-hand operation. I should have just returned for a refund, but this was the quicker fix. Cheap build quality. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Robert  Butler

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I Love this sharpener, I have one Ive used it for years, just bought this one for my grandchildren. sharpens perfectly
customer_reviews.author: barblee

customer_reviews.title: Hope you like uneven pencils
customer_reviews.text: Leaves pencils super rough and uneven. Thought it might just be cheaper pencils, but nope. Every single pencil sharpens crooked. Returning and getting something different
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Carey

customer_reviews.title: Worked well, for the month it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Would give it 5 stars for how well it worked WHILE it worked, but after it fell off my kids’ chair and onto the carpeted floor (mind you it was a toddler chair and a foot off the ground), it stopped working entirely—kind of surprised considering it didn’t fall from a great height or onto concrete or hardwood...into the trash it went :(
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Very loud!
customer_reviews.text: On the box it says quiet yet it sounds like a tractor. It sounds like it’s about to fall apart. It doesn’t sharpen the pencils too well either my first thought is they sent me something used. Well it’s going back! Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Meco Lajuan

customer_reviews.title: needs a better guide to insert the pencil so you don't have ...
customer_reviews.text: Sharpens pencils unevenly; needs a better guide to insert the pencil so you don't have to do this 2 or 3 times to get it right
customer_reviews.author: hummingbird

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our home office and school use. This sharpener sharpens to a nice point. Its not super loud and is quick. A nice sleek design for desktop.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just like our other one and just like the picture and great quality and condition.
customer_reviews.author: BRENDA

product_meta.title: X-ACTO Electric Sharpener, Two-Tone Silver/Gray (1900)
product_meta.description: Stylish and dependable, the X-ACTO Helix Electric Pencil Sharpener delivers smart sharpening technology for your home, office, or school. This sleek sharpener utilizes a hardened helical cutter that efficiently sharpens pencils to a smooth and precise tip and a powerful yet quiet electric motor that provides reliable operation. An Auto-Reset feature prevents the motor from overheating, the SafeStart feature helps protect users, and PencilSaver technology eliminates oversharpening to extend pencil life and minimize waste.
feature_bullets: Sleek design fits home and office decor
Helical cutter efficiently and precisely sharpens pencils
PencilSaver technology eliminates oversharpening and extends pencil life
Auto Reset and SafeStart help protect sharpener and user

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars979 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
